Title: Flight into Terror
Plot: Ted and co. end up being crammed in a plane along with every other priest who has appeared in their lives after a visit to the Shrine of Kinlettle. In a fit of the usual stupidity, Dougal manages to empty the fuel tanks on the plane. To make matters worse, there are only two parachutes to go around many more priests, so Ted devises a way for the priests to compete for the parachutes. Unfortunately, Jack has other plans for the parachutes.
GuestStars: Graham Norton, Gerard Murphy, Patrick Duggan, Jimmy Keogh, Paul Hickey, Jonathan White, Liam O'Carroll, Kevin Gildea, Graham Linehan, Nick Wynter, Dave Dale
